item.title: Winds of change
item.author: karl.hepworth@gmail.com (Karl Hepworth)
item.description: Catch 22: I can’t and won’t reveal much about my work, specific products, services or companies. Work will not make it here directly unless there’s some vocational open-source component. After beginning to work with my previous employer, I helped the team in a range of ways using operational tooling, configuration management and a range of cool, customised open source tools. Slowly, but surely, I made this happen and I managed to continue the innovation even after the team separated due to administrative change.
